name: nw_protocol_stack_t
desc: An ordered set of protocol options that define the protocols that connections and listeners use.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_prepend_application_protocol(nw_protocol_stack_t, nw_protocol_options_t)
items.desc: Adds a protocol onto the top of the protocol stack.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_clear_application_protocols(nw_protocol_stack_t)
items.desc: Removes all application protocols from the protocol stack.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_iterate_application_protocols(nw_protocol_stack_t, (nw_protocol_options_t) -> Void)
items.desc: Iterates through the array of application protocol options that will be used by connections and listeners.

items.name: typealias nw_protocol_stack_iterate_protocols_block_t
items.desc: A block that allows you to inspect or modify a single protocol's options.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_copy_transport_protocol(nw_protocol_stack_t) -> nw_protocol_options_t?
items.desc: Accesses the options for the protocol stack's transport protocol.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_set_transport_protocol(nw_protocol_stack_t, nw_protocol_options_t)
items.desc: Replaces the protocol stack's transport protocol with a new set of options.

items.name: func nw_protocol_stack_copy_internet_protocol(nw_protocol_stack_t) -> nw_protocol_options_t?
items.desc: Accesses the protocol stack's Internet Protocol options.
